description_short: Search for unclaimed cash and property held by the Montana Department of Revenue and submit a free claim through the TransAction Portal (TAP).
title: Montana Unclaimed Property Search (TransAction Portal)

company_or_agency: National Association of Unclaimed Property Administrators (NAUPA)
description_short: Search for unclaimed property held by U.S. states and some Canadian provinces using the official NAUPA tools and MissingMoney multi-state search.
title: Nationwide Unclaimed Property Search (NAUPA & MissingMoney)

description_short: Search the PBGC database for unclaimed pension and retirement benefits from terminated private-sector plans where participants could not be located.
title: Unclaimed Retirement Benefits Search (PBGC)

description_short: Official federal guide for finding unclaimed money from government sources such as tax refunds, bank failures, FHA refunds, and more, with links to the correct search tools.
title: U.S. Government Unclaimed Money Guide (USAGov)
